text:
All right, ladies,
go get your camping badge
or whatever we're doing here.

So, does anyone know anything
about setting up a campsite

or maybe, uh,
lifelong friendship or--

Not me. I'm only here because my
mom said exposure to fresh air

and other kids my age
would help me.
( coughs )
I'm good.

The key to a cozy
campfire is location.

I think we should
set camp here.

We're losing daylight.
Kat, you find the flint.
Molly, you gather firewood.
And, Libby, stay upright.
( Scratch chewing )

Scratch, you can't eat those
berries! They're poisonous.

You know I'm already dead,
right?
Oh, right.

So how's the friend
hunt going?

Not bad.
These score cards have

everything I'm looking for
in a best friend.
Creativity, smarts, generosity,

a deep passion
for fuzzy socks, leadership,

and most importantly,
the X factor.

Wow, that is pretty--
oh, you know what?
I don't care.

I totally won't be
scaring you guys later,

so don't suspect anything.
M'kay, bye!
Wait! Don't you want to know

- what the X factor is?
- Nope!
Well, it's indescribable anyway.
( music playing )
♪ Who's got the goods? ♪

♪ Do you have
what it takes to lead us?
♪ Who's got the goods? ♪

♪ Do you have passion
in your heart? ♪
♪ Who's got the goods? ♪

♪ Can you parkour across
the forest? ♪

♪ We need a hero
in the woods ♪

♪ Tell me
who's got the goods ♪
Ahh! Oh, no!

♪ Who's got the kindness to
care for other creatures? ♪

♪ Who's smart enough to pack
a trail mix with no nuts ♪

- ♪ Peanut allergies ♪
- ♪ Who can outrun ♪

♪ An angry possum that
I accidentally woke ♪

- ♪ With a poke ♪ 
- Go! Go!

♪ Intelligence,
who's got it? ♪
♪ Positivity, who's got it? ♪

♪ Gets my jokes,
who's got it? ♪

♪ Good hygiene,
who's got it? ♪

♪ Not afraid to tell me if
there's chocolate on my cheek ♪
♪ Who's got the goods? ♪
